title: Into the Woods: Tales from the Hollows and Beyond
description: Kim Harrison explores the Hollows more deeply than ever before in Into the Woods, her first collection of short stories.Rachel is here, as are Jenks the pixie, elven tycoon Trent Kalamack, and an unholy host of vampires, demons, shapeshifters, ghosts, and other assorted supernatural beings, friends and foes. Into the Woods combines original work, including a new Hollows novella, as well as all of Kim Harrison's previously published short fiction gathered together in one volume for the very first time.The Bespelled • [The Hollows short fiction] • (2008) • short story Two Ghosts for Sister Rachel • [The Hollows short fiction] • (2007) • novellaUndead in the Garden of Good and Evil • [The Hollows short fiction] • (2006) • novellaDirty Magic • [The Hollows short fiction] • (2008) • short storyThe Bridges of Eden Park • [The Hollows short fiction] • (2007) • short storyLey Line Drifter • [The Hollows short fiction] • (2009) • novellaMillion Dollar Baby • [The Hollows short fiction] • novellaPet Shop Boys • (2012) • novelette by Kim HarrisonTemson Estates • short storySpider Silk • noveletteGrace • novelette
author: Kim Harrison
